properties.areaDesc: Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley; Cadiz Basin
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 1 at 11:37PM PST until February 3 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...West to northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to
50 mph expected.

* WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave. In
California, Cadiz Basin and San Bernardino County-Upper
Colorado River Valley.

* WHEN...From midnight PST /1 AM MST/ Sunday night to 6 PM PST
/7 PM MST/ Monday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and
make driving difficult for high profile vehicles. Strong winds
over the open waters will make the lake water rough and
hazardous...and may result in high waves which may tip or swamp
smaller craft.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT PST /1 AM MST/ SUNDAY NIGHT TO 6 PM PST /7 PM MST/ MONDAY
